conversationHistory.title: Joe, did you get out? How do we find you????

conversationSteps.title: Yo, does someone have my phone?

conversationSteps.title: Dude, have you not noticed we're in the middle of a full blown zombie attack? How are you even alive? Where is Tom and Pete? Lou?

This is Joe. Joe Manganiello. I was with some friends and we were on the island for the weekend when all of a sudden... zombies. Out of nowhere. My dog Bubbles ran away so I ran after him. We're together now, but I'm worried my friends didn't make it out alive.
conversationSteps.choice1: I don't know Tom or Pete. I'm starting to freak out over here.

conversationSteps.title: YES. Please don't freak out. I need your help. We can get out of this.

The zombies are tricky, fast, and deadly. If you get bit, you're dead within hours. You must be in peak physical condition to fight these bastards off. In my phone is a digital version of my book, Evolution. It'll help you reach peak physical condition in order to survive.
conversationSteps.choice1: How are we going to escape though?

conversationSteps.title: Trust me. We can make it out of this alive. I have to go move, they're after me. I'll message you once I'm in a safe place.
How soon can you meet me at the Flatiron Building? No public transport!
Thank you. Wait for my call. I have information for you.
Just follow my instructions and you'll be fine
Everything will make sense very soon
